---
category: news
title: "Certification programme in Deep Learning"
excerpt: "The Indian Institute of Science (IISc) and TalentSprint have launched a PG level Advanced Certification Programme in Deep Learning. The 10-month executive education programme will be taught by a team of inter-disciplinary faculty from IISc and TalentSprint through live and interactive online classes."
